sentences.en: A dogged air of confidence exuded.
sentences.cn: 坚定不移的信心显露无遗。

sentences.en: He achieved success through dogged persistence.
sentences.cn: 他靠着坚持不懈取得了成功.

sentences.en: He continued to stand before her, in his dogged weakness.
sentences.cn: 他继续站在她面前, 懦弱地纠缠不放.

sentences.en: He had again the corrosive sense of failure that always dogged him.
sentences.cn: 老是摆脱不掉的那种侵心的不争气之感,顿时又笼罩在他的心头.

sentences.en: He has been dogged by allegations of questionable business practices.
sentences.cn: 他一直被那些指控他有不正当商业行为的说法所困扰。

sentences.en: He was dogged by his misfortune.
sentences.cn: 不幸的事总是纠缠着他.

sentences.en: His career has been dogged by bad luck.
sentences.cn: 他在事业上一直不走运。

sentences.en: His dogged determination helped him to win the race.
sentences.cn: 他的坚强决心使他赢得比赛.

sentences.en: His dogged pursuit of the presidency was turning into a national joke.
sentences.cn: 他还执拗地谋求总统职位变成了全国的笑柄.

sentences.en: I was quite impressed by her dogged determination to succeed.
sentences.cn: 她想成功的坚定决心让我印象深刻.

sentences.en: The problems that have dogged him all year are just a temporary setback.
sentences.cn: 一时的挫折竟困扰了他一整年。

sentences.en: Their dogged single-mindedness is almost heroic.
sentences.cn: 他们不屈不挠专心致志的劲头简直是一种壮举。

sentences.en: They have gained respect through sheer dogged determination.
sentences.cn: 他们完全是凭借顽强的毅力赢得了尊敬。

sentences.en: Violence, on the field and in the stands, dogged soccer's heels.
sentences.cn: 赛场上动作粗野,看台上行凶斗殴的现象却在足球比赛时连连发生.

words.tran_cn: 狗；；丑女人；卑鄙的人；（俚）朋友；vt. 跟踪；尾随

phrases.tran_cn: 狗食；一文不值，分文不值
自己不能享用也不让他人享用的人
[美国口语] 我可赌咒；见鬼
[口语]莫惹是非，别惹麻烦，不自找麻烦；别多事[亦作 don't wake a sleeping dog]

trans.tran_en: dogged behaviour shows that you are very determined to continue doing something
